DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , ascend single-dose study VIA-3196 evaluate Safety , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics VIA-3196 Healthy Subjects . Study dose organize cohort correspond escalate dos VIA-3196 match placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Ascending Single-Dose Study Evaluate VIA-3196 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: The subject must willing able provide write informed consent . Healthy , nonsmoking , male female age 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) . If female , subject nonchild bearing potential ( i.e. , surgically [ bilateral oophorectomy , hysterectomy , tubal ligation ] naturally sterile [ > 12 consecutive month without menses ] ) . Verify FSH screen appropriate . Body weight > 50 kg BMI 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . LDL cholesterol > 85 mg/dL . No clinically significant abnormal finding blood pressure , heart rate , physical examination , clinical laboratory test 12lead ECG . Key History thyroid disorder abnormal thyroid function test screen . Repeat test allow discretion Investigator . History unexplained syncope . History hepatobiliary disease ; AST , ALT direct bilirubin great upper limit reference range screening . Positive screen test HIV antibody , Hepatitis B surface antigen Hepatitis C antibody . Abnormal screen ECG : include machineread QTc > 450 msec , QRS > 110 msec , intermittent bundle branch block , frequent premature atrial premature ventricular contraction , rhythm normal sinus rhythm interpret Investigator clinically significant . History sensitivity similar study drug ( e.g. , Karo Bio KB2115 Metabasis MB7811 ) , history important drug allergy ( except untreated , asymptomatic seasonal allergy time dose ) . Sensitivity thyroid medication . History asthma , intolerance betablockers . Use acetaminophen within 7 day dose throughout study . History regular use tobacco nicotine containing product within past 6 month . Positive urine drug screen alcohol test screening .
